text: Hey TouchArcade community! I'm excited to announce the release of my new mobile game, Drone Attack: Pig Irruption! Available now on Apple App Store, this game offers action-packed fun with intuitive one-handed controls, perfect for gaming on the go. Game Overview: In Drone Attack: Pig Irruption, you pilot a drone and drop various bombs to eliminate waves of mischievous pigs. Complete missions by destroying the required number of pigs or go all out and wipe out every pig on the map. Unlock new levels, weapons, and buffs as you progress, and upgrade your drone for even more explosive power! Key Features: One-Handed Controls: Designed for easy, on-the-go play. Diverse Arsenal: From dynamite with nails to massive mines, use unique weapons to tackle different challenges. Strategic Gameplay: Plan your attacks and use buffs to gain an edge. Challenging Levels: Test your skills with increasing difficulty and unlock new abilities. Resource Management: Earn money by destroying pigs and invest in upgrades and ammo. Whether you’re dealing with dynamite with nails for enclosed spaces or using a simple bomb, there’s always a new strategy to try. And when you’ve had enough, unleash the largest bomb and watch everything go boom! Destroy your enemies in exciting combos, collect coins from sunflowers, and master creative ways to eliminate your enemies. Endless Fun Whether you're playing for strategy or simple destruction, each mission offers new surprises. With achievements, leaderboards, and constant updates, there's always something to strive for! Join the chaos and prove your dominance from the skies!   2. Drone Attack: Pig Irruption Update 1.1.0 - General Bug Fixes, Improvements, and New Feature!

    General Bug Fixes and Improvements: I’ve squashed some bugs and made performance improvements to ensure a smoother and more enjoyable gaming experience.

    New Feature - Balls with Numbers: Introducing an exciting new feature! Now, when your drone destroys more than one enemy at a time, balls with numbers will appear, showing exactly how many pigs you took out in one go! It adds a whole new level of satisfaction to your pig-hunting adventures.

  3. Hey everyone!

    We’re excited to announce the release of Drone Attack: Pig Irruption update v1.1.1! This update adds emotions to the pigs, making them even more expressive and engaging. We’ve also fixed a lot of bugs to ensure a smoother gameplay experience.

    Check it out and let us know what you think!

  4. Update v1.2.0 Released!

    Exciting news for all Drone Attack: Pig Irruption players! I’ve just rolled out update v1.2.0 with major improvements:

    • Redesigned game interface buttons for better visibility.
    • Quick access to bombs for faster gameplay.
    • Enhanced store button descriptions with pulsation.
    • Disabled automatic ads for a smoother experience.
    • General bug fixes and performance improvements.
    Dive back into the action and enjoy the new features! Let me know your thoughts and any feedback. Happy gaming!

  5. v1.3.0 Update is Live!

    The battle intensifies in my latest update! Say hello to the Combat Mosquito drone, a powerful new unit with the ability to suck the souls of defeated enemies to regain health. Alongside the drone, this update also includes bug fixes, performance improvements, and more refined gameplay. Get ready for strategic destruction as you fight against the pig menace in new ways. Try it out now!

  6. Big Update 1.4.0! New Level, Trucks, and More!

    Hey everyone! We’ve just released a huge update for Drone attack: pig irruption, bringing exciting new features and improvements:

    ✅ New Level: Featuring Buff Automatization & Trucks for tactical gameplay!
    ✅ New Maps: Explore fresh battlegrounds & test new strategies!
    ✅ New Music: Upgraded soundtracks for lobby & missions!
    ✅ Difficulty Selection: Play your way – easy or hardcore!
    ✅ Optimized Performance: Smaller file size, better performance!
    ✅ Joystick Descriptions & Bug Fixes!

    Download the update & let us know your thoughts!

    Hey everyone!
    We’ve just released update 1.4.2 and here’s what’s new:

    • Added moonshine still — pigs gain HP and turn blue
